subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00BE_01C9DEEA.5770E5E0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

My thing is, if they want to hang around, I get to try and benefit from it =
:)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SnowfireL@... 
  To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 4:23 PM
  Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV






  Well, everything is done =
for a reason, I believe this gift of communication has been given to us for=
 a reason, not just to sell tickets, but to help ourselves still in the wor=
ld, by moving those other's on, we in a sense move ourselves on to better a=
nd higher vibration.

  In a message dated 5/27/2009 6:18:50 P.M. Eastern D=
aylight Time, foreverhaunted57@... writes:




    We all have our ow=
n beliefs. I make no judgements on the living or the dead. I just communica=
te and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. Many,many spirits have asked m=
e for help. If they can help themselves, they do not seem to know how. The =
prisoners believe that they would be trapped. if they died there. Are they =
imprisoned by their own beliefs?
    Steve




----------------------------=
------------------------------------------------
    From: April Abercrombi=
e <april@...>
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    =
Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:58:19 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost B=
ox Demo at Moundsville WV



    In a way, I agree. "Stuck" implies acciden=
tal. If a ghost is hanging around, it there by choice, whether it is fully =
aware of that or not.

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Fran=
k Sumption 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May =
27, 2009 3:55 PM
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville=
 WV



       I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I think that's Hollywo=
od. The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is you get the evidence=
 you expect to get, so it will tend to support the concept of stuck souls. =
When I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, and hauntings are fo=
r show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another. 

       I did a re=
cording at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "ghost--right behind=
 you". I was recording open air with the test board running.  

       Fran=
k-S


      On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:


=



        Well, stand outside the thing, and help those poor souls out, he=
re they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are asking for help.=
  Shame on them, don't they realize  how many lost souls there are out ther=
e, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them,)  were I to name a=
ll the tribes, country, religions, throughout the years, people that died t=
rapped, in various places over century's, and yes there are thousand's of t=
hem in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their own making, no progressi=
on, no light, no hope, without people they love, and who wait still loving =
them, they exist in these dark places without God.  This mission should be =
to help them get back to God, back to the light of God, light of Universe h=
owever, we want to call it, but in that light is love and happiness.  Just =
my take, sf

        In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42:33 P.M. Eastern Dayl=
ight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




          Yes, you need =
special permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a guest of E=
astern Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe me when I s=
ay "it ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would appreciate me rele=
asing the inmates before their eternal sentence has been served..
         =
 Steve




----------------------------------------------------------------=
------
          From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

         =
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

          Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 2:31=
:57 PM 

          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
=




          Does one need special permission to get in there?  You folks =
should go back, and release them since a few of them already know you Steve=
, this is Steve?  Right?  sf

          In a message dated 5/27/2009 2:15:1=
0 P.M.. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




    =
        Unfortunately I did not get to attempt to cross them. After my demo=
nstration, another group that was also there started complaining that the b=
ox made too much noise and was hendering their investigation so I turned it=
 off. I wouldn't want my direct communication with the deceased inmates to =
mess up their EVP work, now would I? I apoligized and put it away for the r=
est of the night.
             According to the prison staff, the inmates f=
irmly believed that if they died in prison their souls would be forever tra=
pped there. This belief was so strong that the prison officials would take =
the elderly inmates who were dying of natural causes to a local hospital so=
 they would'nt have to die in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were well fou=
nded.     




------------------------------------------------------------=
--------
            From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

     =
       To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

            Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2=
009 12:36:12 PM 

            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moun=
dsville WV




            This is a wonderful recording, were you able to =
free any of them?  So sad to see them still there behind bars, must be very=
 lonely for them, they should be moving on so, they can start to work on ma=
king up for things on the other side.  You folks should go up there again, =
and hold a small prayer vigil for them, of course they would no longer be g=
hosts trapped there, but there are plenty more around. sf

            In a=
 message dated 5/27/2009 12:10:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunte=
d57@ yahoo.com writes:



              I was invited to spend the night in=
 the West Virginia Penitentiary this past weekend... I was asked to give a =
short demonstration with my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside the pr=
ison surrounded by concrete and steel, the radio could not pick up any radi=
o stations in manual mode. I wasn't sure how this might effect the demonstr=
ation. I was pleasantly surprised with the results. I recorded the session =
and the results can be heard at this link. http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=
=3DKwDYu4RULlk
